sql-statements.statement: select trans_owner_id, detail,trans_id,trans_type,provider_id, nvl(to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY'),'No Date') as trans_begin_stamp from transaction where trans_owner_id = ? and trans_status = 2 and trans_type = 9500 ORDER BY 6 asc

select simple_name, count (*) as count, min(trans_begin_stamp),max(trans_begin_stamp), trans_owner_id from transaction t, person where trans_owner_id = person.person_id and trans_status = 2 and trans_type = 9500 and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Invoice_Worklist iw WHERE trans_owner_id = iw.person_id AND worklist_status = 'Account In Collection' AND worklist_type = 'Collection' AND owner_id = ? AND responsible_id = ? AND org_internal_id = ? ) group by simple_name,trans_owner_id
